Package it.polimi.ingsw.cli

Class CommandLine

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.cli.CommandLine
public class CommandLine
extends java.lang.Object

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.lang.String pathForDevCards  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    CommandLine()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void actionMarbleMarket​(MarbleColor[][] tray, MarbleColor slide)
    printMarbleMarket interacts with the user to make him take resource from the market tray;
    static void actionMarbleMarket​(MarbleColor[][] tray, MarbleColor slide, Client client, GameStatusUpdate status)
    method that is used if the client selects the action of acquiring resources from the market
    static void buyCardServerInteraction​(int cardId, Client serverConnection, GameStatusUpdate status)
    method that calls sends the first message and then handles all the in-Between exchange of messages to the right method (handleInBetweenActionBuyACard).
    static void cardDetails​(int[][] marketCards)
    cardDetails can be invoked from printMarket when the user types "details"; it helps the user giving him more information about the cards in the market
    static int checkForDepotChoice​(java.lang.String string, boolean[] emptyStatus)
    method that handles the request to select a level or discard the resources after a marble market action. this is a twin method to the ClientHandler.handleNotStoredResources() method
    static boolean checkValidCardSelection​(int[][] marketcards, int selection)
    method that checks if a selected card by the user is a valid card inside the market
    static int chooseADepotAction​(boolean[] valid)
    if the server communicates a CHOOSE_A_DEPOT message this method is invoked. this method request a selection from the client stating which slot they select.
    static void CoolPrint​(PlayerUpdate board)
    prints a status of the faithtrack
    static void developmentPopulate​(java.lang.String path)
    developmentPopulate populates the developmentCards array of the class, so that the cli can keep a local copy of the whole deck of development cards
    static void EndGame​(LastMessage finalMessage)
    method used when the game is finished.
    static void EndTurn​(Client connection)
    method that sends a request to end the turn and wait for an answer from the server
    static void handleAnswerToProduction​(ProductionActionMessage answer, Client client)
    handles the final message from the server after sending the production selections, which is either a success or a failure
    static void handleInBetweenActionBuyACard​(Client client, GameStatusUpdate status)
    after the first message is sent (containing the selected card) this method handles whether the action can continue or not.
    static void handleMarket​(Client client, int line, boolean rowColumn, GameStatusUpdate status)
    method used inside printMarbleMarket to send the message to the server and to handle additional communication necessities that may surge
    static void handleProductionAnswer​(ProductionActionMessage answer, GameStatusUpdate status, Client client)
    handles the first case where the server either sends a request to know which productions to activate (AVAILABLE_PRODUCTIONS) or a denial of action (UNAVAILABLE_ACTION) the server answers unavailable action if the resources are 0 or the resources are less then 2 and no leader or development card is acquired by the client
    static void instantFinish​(Client client)  
    static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)  
    static void makeSelection​(GameStatusUpdate status, boolean[] productionsUsable, Client client)
    method that asks the client to select a production until the client selects "quit". the method invokes another method for handling all the extra interactions.
    static void manageSelection​(int selection, boolean[] productionsUsable, int[] selectionsToModify)
    handles all the client interactions after selecting a production.
    static void marbleMarketStatus​(MarbleColor[][] tray, MarbleColor slide)
    method that prints the state of the marble market.
    static void messageUpdateFromOtherPlayers​(java.lang.String Update)
    shows what action the last player did during a multiplayer match
    static void playLeader​(PlayerUpdate player)
    playLeader interacts with the user when he wants to play or discard a leader card from his hand
    static void PlayOrDiscardLeaders​(int player, GameStatusUpdate status, Client client)
    method that handles the action playOrDiscardLeader.
    static void printActivePlayerPersonalBoard​(PlayerUpdate board)
    should be used for printing only the active player board
    static void printAnswerForPlayLeaderAction​(int answerFromServer)
    method that prints the result of the playOrDiscardLeader action
    static void printArray​(int[] array)
    printArray is useful to show costs and productions to the user; it's invoked from printDevelopmentCard
    static boolean printCardMarket​(int[][] marketCards)
    printCardMarket receives a two-dimensional array containing the 12 IDs of the cards in the market and interacts with the user so he can buy one
    static void printCardMarket​(int[][] marketCards, Client serverConnection, GameStatusUpdate status)
    started method for the BUY_A_CARD action, it prints the status of the market, then it can show details of a card, try to by a card (by calling the right methods) or quit the action
    static void printDepotChoice​(boolean[] emptyDepots, int[] resourceToManage)
    method that prints the state of the storage before the selection of a level to store a new type of resource
    static void printDevelopmentCard​(int id)
    printDevelopmentCard shows all the characteristics of a Development Card to the user; it's invoked from other methods
    static void printLeader​(int id)
    printLeader shows all the characteristics of a Leader Card to the user; it's invoked from other methods
    static int printLeadersAndChoose​(boolean[] whichToPrint, int Player, GameStatusUpdate status)
    prints the leaders usable in the action and asks the client which one they want to activate
    static void printPersonalBoard​(PlayerUpdate board)
    printPersonalBoard shows every relevant characteristic of the personal board of a single user
    static void printPlayerLeaders​(int player, GameStatusUpdate status)
    method that prints the leaders of a player and states if they have already obtained them or not (doesn't check if discarded or not obtained)
    static void printResourcesArray​(int[] array)
    printResourcesArray is useful to show costs and production to the user; the same as printArray but it doesn't include faith points
    static void printSmallMarketVersion​(int[][] marketCards)
    prints a shallow version of the market (only id and cost)
    static void printSpecificLeaders​(GameStatusUpdate status, int type)
    prints all the leaders possessed by a player which corresponds to a specified leader type

    0: discount
    1: storage
    2: whiteball
    3: production
    static void printSpecificPlayedLeaders​(GameStatusUpdate status, int type)
    prints all the leaders played by a player which corresponds to a specified leader type

    0: discount
    1: storage
    2: whiteball
    3: production
    static void printStorageStatus​(PlayerUpdate board)
    prints a status of a player storage
    static void printTopOfSlots​(GameStatusUpdate status)
    method that prints the status of all the slots of the current active player
    static void printTopOfSlots​(GameStatusUpdate status, boolean[] onlyPrintThese)
    override of the printTopOfSlots
    prints all the slots available to store a card of a specified level, and prints the top card (if there's any) of the slot.
    static boolean production​(PlayerUpdate player)
    production interacts with the user when he wants to activate the production of his development and/or leader cards
    static void ProductionAction​(GameStatusUpdate status, boolean[] productionsUsable, Client client)
    prints the status of the slots and the status of the production leaders (if the client has played any), then asks to make a selection
    static void ProductionActionStarter​(GameStatusUpdate status, Client client)
    starts the production action.
    static void startingLeaders​(int l1, int l2, int l3, int l4)
    Deprecated.
    startingLeaders is invoked at the beginning of a game to help a user choose his initial leaders
    static void swapDepots​(int[][] storage)
    swapDepots helps the user swap resources between his depots
    static void swapDepots​(int[][] storage, Client client)
    handles the request to swap levels made from the client. the action has no effect on the turn status so nothing is affected in either client and server
    static void totallyNormalAndNotSuspiciousAtAllMethod​(Client client)  
    static void turnMgmt​(java.lang.String inputJson)
    turnMgmt manages every action that can be done during the user's turn; it receives a Json containing the game state, deserializes it and interacts with the user to ask him what action he wants to perform, invoking methods accordingly
    static void turnMgmt​(java.lang.String inputJson, Client serverConnection)
    overload for actual usage (implements connections)
    this method handles all the turn actions a player can make, and is in constant communication with the server by sending actions and receiving gameUpdates.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • cardDetails

      public static void cardDetails​(int[][] marketCards)
      cardDetails can be invoked from printMarket when the user types "details"; it helps the user giving him more information about the cards in the market
      Parameters:
      marketCards - game update contains the market cards vector id

    • printCardMarket

      public static boolean printCardMarket​(int[][] marketCards) throws java.io.IOException
      printCardMarket receives a two-dimensional array containing the 12 IDs of the cards in the market and interacts with the user so he can buy one
      Parameters:
      marketCards - game update contains the market cards vector id
      Returns:
      true if the user confirms he wants to buy a card, false if he wants to choose another action
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • actionMarbleMarket

      printMarbleMarket interacts with the user to make him take resource from the market tray;

      Parameters:

    • production

      public static boolean production​(PlayerUpdate player)
      production interacts with the user when he wants to activate the production of his development and/or leader cards
      Parameters:
      player -
      Returns:
      true if the user confirms the production action, false if he wants to choose another one

    • swapDepots

      public static void swapDepots​(int[][] storage)
      swapDepots helps the user swap resources between his depots
      Parameters:

    • turnMgmt

      public static void turnMgmt​(java.lang.String inputJson)
      turnMgmt manages every action that can be done during the user's turn; it receives a Json containing the game state, deserializes it and interacts with the user to ask him what action he wants to perform, invoking methods accordingly
      Parameters:
      inputJson -

    • marbleMarketStatus

      public static void marbleMarketStatus​(MarbleColor[][] tray, MarbleColor slide)
      method that prints the state of the marble market.
      Parameters:
      tray - view of the market grid
      slide - view of the slide marble

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

    • turnMgmt

      public static void turnMgmt​(java.lang.String inputJson, Client serverConnection)
      overload for actual usage (implements connections)
      this method handles all the turn actions a player can make, and is in constant communication with the server by sending actions and receiving gameUpdates.
      Parameters:
      inputJson - when the method is called a first ActionMessage containing the Status of the game is sent, the GameStatusUpdate object is contained as a JSON string inside this parameter
      serverConnection - connection with the server

    • swapDepots

      public static void swapDepots​(int[][] storage, Client client)
      handles the request to swap levels made from the client. the action has no effect on the turn status so nothing is affected in either client and server
      Parameters:
      storage - status of your storage
      client - handles all the connection with server stuff

    • actionMarbleMarket

      public static void actionMarbleMarket​(MarbleColor[][] tray, MarbleColor slide, Client client, GameStatusUpdate status)
      method that is used if the client selects the action of acquiring resources from the market
      Parameters:
      tray - view of the state of the marble market
      slide - view of the state of the slide_marble in the marble market
      client - connection to the server is handled via this object

    • handleMarket

      public static void handleMarket​(Client client, int line, boolean rowColumn, GameStatusUpdate status)
      method used inside printMarbleMarket to send the message to the server and to handle additional communication necessities that may surge
      Parameters:
      client - contains the connection with the server
      line - int between 1 and 3 (or 4 depending on the boolean rowColumn) that indicates which part of the marble market was selected
      rowColumn - switcher for selecting a row or a column of the marble market

    • printLeadersAndChoose

      public static int printLeadersAndChoose​(boolean[] whichToPrint, int Player, GameStatusUpdate status)
      prints the leaders usable in the action and asks the client which one they want to activate
      Parameters:
      whichToPrint - boolean vector stating which leaders are usable
      Player - id of player
      status - GameStatus, used to get the Leaders IDs
      Returns:
      choice of the client (0-1-2) or -1 if some errors occurred

    • printDepotChoice

      public static void printDepotChoice​(boolean[] emptyDepots, int[] resourceToManage)
      method that prints the state of the storage before the selection of a level to store a new type of resource
      Parameters:
      emptyDepots - boolean vector sent by the server generated in Storage.emptyStatus()
      resourceToManage - vector containing the type of resource that needs to be handled and the quantity of it

    • checkForDepotChoice

      public static int checkForDepotChoice​(java.lang.String string, boolean[] emptyStatus)
      method that handles the request to select a level or discard the resources after a marble market action. this is a twin method to the ClientHandler.handleNotStoredResources() method
      Parameters:
      string - selection made by the client
      emptyStatus - status of the storage, this boolean is created in the Storage.emptyStatus() method
      Returns:
      0 if the client wants to discard the resources, 1-3 for the level selected (if valid) -1 if the input is invalid, whichever the case would be (not a valid level or not a valid input)

    • EndTurn

      public static void EndTurn​(Client connection)
      method that sends a request to end the turn and wait for an answer from the server
      Parameters:
      connection - handles connection with the server

    • PlayOrDiscardLeaders

      public static void PlayOrDiscardLeaders​(int player, GameStatusUpdate status, Client client)
      method that handles the action playOrDiscardLeader. The selection is made for only one leader, so the client needs to repeat the action if they want to play both leaders (or any combination with discarding them) during the same turn
      Parameters:
      player - id of the player taking is turn
      status - game status used to show and find the leaders
      client - connection with the server

    • printPlayerLeaders

      public static void printPlayerLeaders​(int player, GameStatusUpdate status)
      method that prints the leaders of a player and states if they have already obtained them or not (doesn't check if discarded or not obtained)
      Parameters:
      player - player being checked
      status - GameState of the match

    • printAnswerForPlayLeaderAction

      public static void printAnswerForPlayLeaderAction​(int answerFromServer)
      method that prints the result of the playOrDiscardLeader action
      Parameters:
      answerFromServer - answer recived from the server

    • printCardMarket

      public static void printCardMarket​(int[][] marketCards, Client serverConnection, GameStatusUpdate status) throws java.io.IOException
      started method for the BUY_A_CARD action, it prints the status of the market, then it can show details of a card, try to by a card (by calling the right methods) or quit the action
      Parameters:
      marketCards - market of the cards (only top cards are displayed)
      serverConnection - connection with the server, it's given to the methods that try to buy a card
      status - gameStatus, used to print the status of market or slots in the "buy a card" related methods
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - disconnection with server occurred

    • checkValidCardSelection

      public static boolean checkValidCardSelection​(int[][] marketcards, int selection)
      method that checks if a selected card by the user is a valid card inside the market
      Parameters:
      marketcards - market
      selection - chosen card's id
      Returns:
      true if the id is present in the market, false otherwise

    • printSmallMarketVersion

      public static void printSmallMarketVersion​(int[][] marketCards)
      prints a shallow version of the market (only id and cost)
      Parameters:
      marketCards - market

    • buyCardServerInteraction

      public static void buyCardServerInteraction​(int cardId, Client serverConnection, GameStatusUpdate status)
      method that calls sends the first message and then handles all the in-Between exchange of messages to the right method (handleInBetweenActionBuyACard).
      Parameters:
      cardId - id of the selected card
      serverConnection - connection with the server
      status - gameStatus, used by some methods down the sequence of calls

    • handleInBetweenActionBuyACard

      public static void handleInBetweenActionBuyACard​(Client client, GameStatusUpdate status)
      after the first message is sent (containing the selected card) this method handles whether the action can continue or not. It does all the setups for the current turn and select which method should be called next, whether the action is aborted by the server or not
      Parameters:
      client - connection with server
      status - gameStatus that is used by some method called in the body of this method

    • printTopOfSlots

      public static void printTopOfSlots​(GameStatusUpdate status)
      method that prints the status of all the slots of the current active player
      Parameters:
      status - gameStatus

    • printTopOfSlots

      public static void printTopOfSlots​(GameStatusUpdate status, boolean[] onlyPrintThese)
      override of the printTopOfSlots
      prints all the slots available to store a card of a specified level, and prints the top card (if there's any) of the slot.
      Parameters:
      status - gameStatus used to print the cards.
      onlyPrintThese - boolean[] sent by the server stating which slot should be printed

    • chooseADepotAction

      public static int chooseADepotAction​(boolean[] valid)
      if the server communicates a CHOOSE_A_DEPOT message this method is invoked. this method request a selection from the client stating which slot they select.
      Parameters:
      valid - check sent by the controller to check which slot can be used
      Returns:
      the selected slot

    • printSpecificLeaders

      public static void printSpecificLeaders​(GameStatusUpdate status, int type)
      prints all the leaders possessed by a player which corresponds to a specified leader type

      0: discount
      1: storage
      2: whiteball
      3: production
      Parameters:
      status - game status used to get the leaders' ids
      type - type of leader, as explained in the part before

    • printSpecificPlayedLeaders

      public static void printSpecificPlayedLeaders​(GameStatusUpdate status, int type)
      prints all the leaders played by a player which corresponds to a specified leader type

      0: discount
      1: storage
      2: whiteball
      3: production
      Parameters:
      status - game status used to get the leaders' ids
      type - type of leader, as explained in the part before

    • ProductionActionStarter

      public static void ProductionActionStarter​(GameStatusUpdate status, Client client)
      starts the production action. Sends a request to the server and forwards the answer to a nested method that handles further interactions with the server
      Parameters:
      status - gameStatus used deeper down the call tree
      client - connection with the server

    • handleProductionAnswer

      public static void handleProductionAnswer​(ProductionActionMessage answer, GameStatusUpdate status, Client client)
      handles the first case where the server either sends a request to know which productions to activate (AVAILABLE_PRODUCTIONS) or a denial of action (UNAVAILABLE_ACTION) the server answers unavailable action if the resources are 0 or the resources are less then 2 and no leader or development card is acquired by the client
      Parameters:
      answer -
      status -
      client -

    • handleAnswerToProduction

      public static void handleAnswerToProduction​(ProductionActionMessage answer, Client client)
      handles the final message from the server after sending the production selections, which is either a success or a failure
      Parameters:
      answer - answer from server
      client - connection (used to recive an abort message)

    • ProductionAction

      public static void ProductionAction​(GameStatusUpdate status, boolean[] productionsUsable, Client client)
      prints the status of the slots and the status of the production leaders (if the client has played any), then asks to make a selection
      Parameters:
      status - gameStatus
      productionsUsable - sent by the server this vector contains which productions are theoretically usable (does not check if a combination is still usable)

    • makeSelection

      public static void makeSelection​(GameStatusUpdate status, boolean[] productionsUsable, Client client)
      method that asks the client to select a production until the client selects "quit". the method invokes another method for handling all the extra interactions. after the client selects quit a message containing the final choice is sent to the server
      Parameters:
      status - gameStatus
      productionsUsable - sent by the server this vector contains which productions are theoretically usable (does not check if a combination is still usable)
      client - contains the serverConnection

    • manageSelection

      public static void manageSelection​(int selection, boolean[] productionsUsable, int[] selectionsToModify)
      handles all the client interactions after selecting a production.
      Parameters:
      selection - production selected in the makeSelection method
      productionsUsable - sent by the server this vector contains which productions are theoretically usable (does not check if a combination is still usable)
      selectionsToModify - vector that will be sent to the server with all the choices made

    • EndGame

      public static void EndGame​(LastMessage finalMessage)
      method used when the game is finished. It prints the final result for the winner and the player
      Parameters:
      finalMessage - final message sent by the server

    • messageUpdateFromOtherPlayers

      public static void messageUpdateFromOtherPlayers​(java.lang.String Update)
      shows what action the last player did during a multiplayer match
      Parameters:
      Update - update message, should be a Json file of a LastActionMade object

    • totallyNormalAndNotSuspiciousAtAllMethod

      public static void totallyNormalAndNotSuspiciousAtAllMethod​(Client client)

    • instantFinish

      public static void instantFinish​(Client client)
